item.title: Coca-Cola ($KO): Is Warren Buffett's 'Golden Goose' Still Viable in 2025?
item.description: From a 2025 perspective, we re-evaluate the investment value of Coca-Cola ($KO), a stock beloved by investing legend Warren Buffett. Through a sharp debate between Kurumi, who champions its stability and brand power backed by 63 years of dividend increases, and Mikael, who points out the risks of stagnant growth and health trends, we analyze the pros and cons of this ‘Dividend King’.
